oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parton distributions in impact parameter space
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DAHIYA, H
MUKHERJEE, A
RAY, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: virtual compton-scattering
wave-function
quark models
representation
pion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Fourier transform of the generalized parton distributions (GPDs) at zero skewness with respect to the transverse momentum transfer gives the distribution of partons in the impact parameter space. We investigate the GPDs as well as the impact parameter dependent parton distributions (ipdpdfs) by expressing them in terms of overlaps of light-front wave functions (LFWFs) and present a comparative study using three different model LFWFs.
